headline: We've partnered up with EGaDs to give a talk about Game Security on April 5th in GDC 5.302! Our very own William will be talking about how to set up a relatively secure login system for your games, and also how hacking and botting works in popular MMORPGs.
event: Security Day is just around the corner! Hear talks given by industry professionals from the world's top cybersecurity companies, compete in a 5-hour CTF challenge for cool prizes, and get tons of free food and swag! Join the ISSS team on April 12th from 2-9 PM for Security Day!
